# ziti_posture_check_multi_process (Data Source)

Ziti Posture Check Data Source, type: Multi Process check

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ziti_posture_check_multi_process" "test_posture_check_multi_process" {
  name = "test_multi_process"
}

output "ziti_check_multi_process" {
  value = data.ziti_posture_check_multi_process.test_posture_check_multi_process
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Identifier
- `name` (String) Name of the Posture Check
- `semantic` (String) Semantic Value

### Read-Only

- `processes` (Attributes Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--processes))
- `role_attributes` (List of String) Role Attributes
- `tags` (Map of String) Posture Check Tags

<a id="nestedatt--processes"></a>
### Nested Schema for `processes`

Read-Only:

- `hashes` (List of String) File hashes list
- `os_type` (String) Operating System type
- `path` (String) Path
- `signer_fingerprints` (List of String) Signer fingerprints list
